item.title: 南非续签政府与企业合作协议以促进经济增长
item.description: 南非政府与商界领袖正重启合作关系，以新的举措推动经济复苏——该国经济已持续十余年表现低迷。【原文：South Africa’s government and business leaders are rebooting their partnership with a renewed push to revive an economy that has underperformed for more than a decade.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁失去威力
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是来自我们专家嘉宾及信息源网络的深度贡献。无论内容形式如何，我们承诺始终为您带来精彩内容。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: OpenAI推出新工具助力科学家推进人工智能探索
item.description: OpenAI正推出一款免费工具，旨在帮助科学家更便捷地使用ChatGPT起草研究论文并与同事协作。此举是该公司将聊天机器人定位为科研工作与发现助手的整体战略的一部分。【原文：OpenAI is releasing a free tool aimed at making it easier for scientists to use ChatGPT to draft research papers and collaborate with colleagues, part of a larger effort to position its chatbot as an aide for scientific work and discoveries.】

item.title: 跨大西洋柴油价差飙升，冬季风暴扰乱美国供应
item.description: 美国柴油期货价格正大幅上涨，涨幅超过欧洲基准合约。一场冬季风暴过后，持续的严寒天气正给该国燃料市场带来巨大压力。【原文：US diesel futures are surging ahead of benchmark European contracts as a winter storm, followed by continued frigid temperatures, piles pressure on the country’s fuel market.】

item.title: Pinterest在推进人工智能战略之际将裁员"不足15%"
item.description: Pinterest公司表示，计划裁减"少于15%"的员工并缩减办公空间，以将资源转向人工智能领域的投资。【原文：Pinterest Inc. said it plans to cut “less than 15%” of its workforce and reduce office space as it shifts resources toward investing in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚政府增持美元储备，对比索构成压力
item.description: 哥伦比亚财政部自上周五起在即期市场加大美元购买力度，此前该国比索汇率触及近五年来的最高水平。【原文：Colombia’s finance ministry has stepped up dollar purchases in the spot market since Friday, after the peso hit is strongest level in almost five years.】

item.title: Gemini将于二月关闭旗下NFT交易平台Nifty Gateway
item.description: 由泰勒·温克莱沃斯和卡梅伦·温克莱沃斯兄弟创办的加密货币交易所Gemini Trust Co.宣布，其旗下数字艺术代币交易平台Nifty Gateway将于2月关闭。【原文：Gemini Trust Co., the cryptocurrency exchange owned by Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss, said it will shut down its digital-art-token marketplace, Nifty Gateway, in February.】

item.title: 米莱拒绝阿根廷亿万富豪，印度公司赢得输油管道项目
item.description: 哈维尔·米莱政府力推的一项旗舰管道项目，在选择供应商时将外国企业置于阿根廷富豪掌舵的本土巨头之上，此举成为检验总统自由市场理念能否打开保护主义经济大门的试金石。【原文：A flagship pipeline project championed by Javier Milei’s administration chose a foreign supplier over a local giant run by one Argentina’s richest men in a test of the president’s free-market vision to open up a protectionist economy.】

item.title: NextEra在科技企业需求火热之际推出核电服务
item.description: NextEra能源公司正从其位于威斯康星州和新罕布什尔州的核电站出售大量电力，与此同时，多家科技巨头正竞相为人工智能数据中心获取核能。【原文：NextEra Energy Inc. is offering large amounts of power for sale from its nuclear plants in Wisconsin and New Hampshire, as major technology companies race to secure nuclear energy for artificial-intelligence data centers.】

item.title: 医保费率冲击引发保险股900亿美元暴跌
item.description: 提供医疗保险优势计划的健康保险公司遭遇抛售，导致股市市值蒸发逾900亿美元，投资者纷纷撤离这个曾经具有防御性的行业。【原文：The selloff in health insurers that provide Medicare Advantage plans wiped out more than $90 billion in stock-market value as investors fled from the once-defensive sector.】

item.title: 石油巨头埃尼就贸易合作事宜与梅尔库里亚展开磋商
item.description: 据知情人士透露，意大利能源巨头埃尼集团已与墨丘利能源集团就大宗商品贸易领域的潜在合作展开磋商。【原文：Italian energy major Eni SpA has held talks with Mercuria Energy Group over a potential partnership in commodity trading, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Sonos宣布应用程序转型后推出逾一年来首款新产品
item.description: 索诺斯公司时隔一年多推出首款新设备，标志着其刻意放缓产品发布节奏的阶段告终。在新任首席执行官汤姆·康拉德的领导下，该公司优先改进软件并重塑品牌声誉。【原文：Sonos Inc. introduced its first new device in over a year, marking the end of an intentional lull in product launches as the company prioritized improving its software and restoring the brand’s reputation under new Chief Executive Officer Tom Conrad.】

item.title: 摩根大通告并购银行家：加倍努力缩小与高盛的差距
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根大通公司管理层已告知旗下投资银行家，他们需要加倍努力以缩小与高盛集团等竞争对手在并购业务上的差距。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s leadership has told the firm’s investment bankers that they need to work harder to close the gap with rivals including Goldman Sachs Group Inc. on mergers and acquisitions, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 女子在庭审前达成和解，结束TikTok社交媒体成瘾诉讼案
item.description: 一名指控TikTok公司设计其平台以诱使年轻用户上瘾的女性，正寻求与这家社交媒体巨头达成和解。【原文：A woman who sued TikTok over allegations that the company designed its platform to addict young users is moving to settle her lawsuit with the social media giant.】

item.title: 花旗预测白银将飙升至150美元，因中国购买势头依然强劲
item.description: 花旗集团预计现货白银价格将在三个月内触及每盎司150美元的历史新高，延续其历史性涨势——该金属价格在1月份已飙升近50%。【原文：Citigroup Inc. expects spot silver prices to hit a record $150 an ounce within three months, extending a historic rally that has seen the metal surge nearly 50% in January.】

item.title: 安哥拉计划2026年实施14亿美元债务换医疗项目
item.description: 安哥拉财政部在借贷计划中表示，该国今年计划实施一项价值14亿美元的债务换医疗项目。【原文：Angola plans a $1.4 billion debt-for-health swap this year, the finance ministry said in a borrowing plan.】

item.title: 前欧佩克主席被控受贿在伦敦受审
item.description: 检察官在伦敦法庭首日庭审中称，迪扎尼·艾莉森-马杜克担任尼日利亚石油部长期间，收受现金贿赂及"大量"奢侈品福利，以换取将利润丰厚的政府合同转交他人。【原文：Diezani Alison-Madueke accepted cash bribes and “vast quantities” of luxury perks in exchange for handing over lucrative government contracts when she served as Nigerian oil minister, prosecutors said on the first day of a London trial.】

item.title: 亚马逊将关闭其生鲜杂货店和Go便利店
item.description: 亚马逊公司正关闭其自有品牌的杂货店和自动化即取即走商店，这标志着该公司进军实体零售领域的两大核心业务即将终结。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is shuttering its Amazon-branded grocery stores and automated grab-and-go markets, shuttering two centerpieces of its push into physical retail.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数暴跌至2014年以来最低水平
item.description: 美国消费者信心指数1月份下滑至十余年来最低水平，主要源于对经济和劳动力市场的悲观情绪加剧。【原文：US consumer confidence declined in January to the lowest level in more than a decade on more pessimistic views of the economy and labor market.】

item.title: 南非考虑对来自中国和印度的汽车征收高额关税
item.description: 南非正考虑对来自中国和印度的汽车征收高达50%的关税，以保护其汽车产业免受进口潮冲击。【原文：South Africa is considering imposing tariffs of up to 50% on vehicles from China and India as it moves to protect its automotive industry from a flood of imports.】

item.title: 法国财长敦促七国集团避免采取单边措施
item.description: 法国财政部长罗兰·莱斯库尔周二敦促七国集团财长避免采取单边行动，此前欧美因特朗普上周的关税威胁发生冲突。【原文：French Finance Minister Roland Lescure urged his Group of Seven counterparts to refrain from unilateral action on Tuesday after Europe and the US clashed over Donald Trump’s tariff threats last week.】

item.title: 智利国家铜业公司重返全球债务市场，铜价持续上涨
item.description: 智利国家铜业公司（Codelco）今年首次进军全球债券市场，此时铜价正创下历史新高。【原文：Codelco is tapping global bond markets for the first time this year as copper prices reach record highs.】

item.title: 富达逆向基金传奇人物达诺夫在创下10,500%回报率后即将退休
item.description: 威尔·达诺夫——这位全球最富盛名的个人股票挑选者，在执掌富达逆向基金逾三十载期间屡创惊人回报——将于年底正式退休。【原文：Will Danoff, the world’s most prolific solo stock-picker who generated world-beating returns during a run of more than three decades atop the Fidelity Contrafund, is set to retire at year-end.】

item.title: 投资者押注谢恩鲍姆能保护墨西哥比索免受特朗普影响
item.description: 投资者押注总统克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆化解与唐纳德·特朗普争端的能力，将助力延续今年新兴市场中最强劲的货币涨势之一。【原文：Investors are betting President Claudia Sheinbaum’s ability to defuse disputes with Donald Trump will help extend one of the best currency rallies in emerging markets this year.】

item.title: 印度炼油厂撤单后，俄罗斯原油在海上堆积如山
item.description:
自8月以来，海上俄罗斯原油库存已增加约6000万桶

【原文：

About 60 million barrels has been added to Russian crude at sea since August

】

item.title: 标普500指数逼近历史高点，科技股上涨推动，美联储会议前夕
item.description: 美国股市攀升，再度逼近历史高点，科技股在本周关键财报发布及美联储利率决议前走高。【原文：US equities climbed, pushing back toward record highs, as technology stocks advanced ahead key earnings reports and the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate decision this week.】

item.title: 欧盟部署首项卫星服务，旨在减少对美国的依赖
item.description: 欧盟首次启用了其自主研发的安全卫星通信网络的部分功能，这是耗资106亿欧元计划的一部分。该计划旨在为星链卫星通信系统提供替代方案，并在日益紧张的局势下逐步摆脱对美国的依赖。【原文：The European Union has switched on parts of its homegrown secure satellite communications network for the first time, as part of a €10.6 billion push to provide an alternative to Starlink and wean itself off US support amid growing tensions.】

item.title: 联邦快递货运业务在计划分拆前首次发行债券
item.description: 联邦快递货运控股公司正发售其首只投资级美元债券，此举早于该公司计划于6月1日从联邦快递集团分拆上市的时间节点。【原文：FedEx Freight Holding Co. is marketing its first investment-grade dollar bonds ahead of the trucker’s planned June 1 spinoff from FedEx Corp.】

item.title: 下周美国东部遭遇新一轮冬季风暴袭击的可能性正在上升
item.description: 下周初另一场冬季风暴袭击美国东海岸的可能性正在上升，这将再次考验该地区的电网系统。此前一场更强劲的风暴已导致交通中断并引发大范围停电，该地区仍在从这场风暴中恢复。【原文：The odds that another winter storm will pummel the US East Coast early next week are rising, putting power grids to the test again as the region recovers from a larger system that upended travel and triggered widespread blackouts.】

item.title: 荷兰拟取消部分银行及金融科技从业人员的奖金上限
item.description: 荷兰议会下院批准了一项计划，将取消对大多数金融业员工的奖金限制，这是放宽一项长期遭行业诟病的规则的重要一步。【原文：The lower house in the Dutch parliament approved a plan to scrap bonus restrictions for most financial sector staff, a major step in softening a rule that has long been excoriated by the industry.】
